summary: Configuration module for JupyterHub that defines a custom GitHubâ€‘based authenticator, enabling persistent auth_state, exposing selected auth_state values as environment variables to notebook servers, and allowing access to GitHub Gists through those variables.
business_intent: To securely integrate GitHub authentication into JupyterHub deployments, preserving user credentials and automatically providing them to spawned notebook environments so users can interact with their GitHub Gists without manual token handling.
